attributes.action: Help my son Oliver Joyce get a school place closer to home, 3 miles is too far for a 4 year old to travel!
attributes.additional_details:
My four year old boy was not offered any of his preferences for school choices and now they expect to complete a journey which is 3.5 miles door to door (not as the crow flies).
We have been let down by the council by not adding additional choices for schools for us and by incorrect information being given to us.
Please sign this to show the council this distance is not acceptable for a four year old to travel! We need a closer school preferably  within a mile or one form of transport to get to! Our first choice is the nursery he currently goes to but right now we will settle for any closer schools! Please help us
